oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Output feedback discrete-time sliding mode control for time delay systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JANARDHANAN, S
BANDYOPADHYAY, B
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: variable-structure systems
sampling feedback
algorithm
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several algorithms for discrete-time quasi-sliding mode control of time-delay systems with different delay and disturbance structures are proposed. Four different delay structures are considered. All the algorithms are based on multirate output feedback. Hence, they are more practical than state feedback and are less complex compared with observer-based control strategies.
